From Pudding

Double Chocolate Protein Mousse

An intensely rich and chocolatey mousse with 26g of protein, this indulgent treat is a chocolate lover's dream come true. Packed with high-quality protein, it provides a satisfying boost to your muscles while satisfying your sweet tooth, making it an ideal post-workout reward or a nutritious dessert to keep you on track with your fitness goals. The velvety texture melts in your mouth, delivering a perfect balance of smoothness and decadence, while the deep chocolate flavor offers an irresistible, bittersweet richness that leaves you craving more. Whether enjoyed straight from the fridge or topped with fresh berries and a sprinkle of cacao nibs, this mousse is versatile enough for meal prep or a quick snack during busy days. For those with dietary preferences, it can easily be made dairy-free with plant-based milk and vegan chocolate, and gluten-free by choosing certified gluten-free ingredients. To achieve the best results, be sure to thoroughly whip the mixture until it reaches a fluffy consistency and chill it for at least an hour to enhance the rich, airy texture. This guilt-free delight is not only a satisfying treat but also an excellent way to fuel your body with wholesome protein and healthy fats, all while indulging in decadent chocolate goodness.

250

26g
Protein
18g

Prep: 10 min Cook: 0 min Easy Yields: 2 servings
